Title: Your First Year in Network Marketing.
Subtitle: Overcome Your Fears, Experience Success, and Achieve Your Dreams!.
Authors: Mark Yarnell;Rene Reid Yarnell;Rene Yarnell.
Categories: Business & Economics.

Description: Offers advice on dealing with rejection, recruiting others, managing one's downline, maintaining focus and enthusiasm, conducting home meetings, and easing from a profession to full-time network marketing.
